EmailTemplate.description: FTTA. Created for the email notification to FTTA that the License is active.
EmailTemplate.name: Email notification to FTTA- License Active Using Html
EmailTemplate.subject: EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.EPA_File_2__c} - Active
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.00Nr0000001VPB9} with {!EPA_Agreement__c.Partner_Name__c} is now Active.
To access the license, please click the below link.
{!EPA_Agreement__c.00Nr0000001VPB9}
Thank you.
